rows.label: qst300401_msg001
rows.name:
(Temp) Text for when
prerequisites are not met

rows.label: qst300401_msg002
rows.name: Acceptance text

rows.label: qst300401_msg003
rows.name: Post-acceptance text

rows.label: qst300401_msg004
rows.name: Post-task 8 clear text

rows.label: qst300401_msg0001
rows.name:
The reputation of the Hræsvelgr
Merc Group is excellent!

rows.label: qst300401_msg0002
rows.name:
Thanks to that, a big
job has come our way.

rows.label: qst300401_msg0003
rows.name:
Sorry, but could you go and
ask the client directly?

rows.label: qst300401_msg0004
rows.name:
I'd like you to do this mission.
It's at the client's request.

rows.label: qst300401_msg0005
rows.name:
The other party is...[ML:Dash ] I
can't say much here, but
they're quite a big shot.

rows.label: qst300401_msg0006
rows.name:
If we complete this job, I think
the Hræsvelgr Merc Group will be
recognized as the best in Alst.

rows.label: qst300401_msg0007
rows.name: [ML:Dash ]I'm counting on you.

rows.label: qst300401_msg0008
rows.name:
The client is waiting at the
Aquagardens in the Fons Maim Waters...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst300401_msg0009
rows.name:
The time they've requested is
between midnight and 5 AM. Got it?

rows.label: qst300401_msg0101
rows.name:
The client is waiting at the
Aquagardens in the Fons Maim Waters.

rows.label: qst300401_msg0102
rows.name:
The time they've requested is
between midnight and 5 AM. Got it?

rows.label: qst300401_msg0201
rows.name: Good work.

rows.label: qst300401_msg0202
rows.name:
I'm sorry. I couldn't tell you
anything about the client.

rows.label: qst300401_msg0203
rows.name:
While you were looking for
the item, we were tasked
with capturing the culprit.

rows.label: qst300401_msg0204
rows.name:
I thought a queen would just sit
back and relax, but I was wrong.

rows.label: qst300401_msg0205
rows.name:
It's quite the opposite...[ML:Dash ]
She's a fine leader.

rows.label: qst300401_msg0206
rows.name:
Well then, could you bear with
me for just a little longer?

rows.label: qst300401_msg0207
rows.name:
I'll be waiting in front
of Vandham-san's grave, so
please come with Suzaku.
